text: Aldo Giordano (20 August 1954 â€“ 2 December 2021) was an Italian prelate of the Catholic Church. He was Apostolic Nuncio to the European Union in 2021. He was Apostolic Nuncio to Venezuela from 2013 to 2021. He was the Permanent Observer of the Holy See to the Council of Europe in Strasbourg from 2008 to 2013. Giordano was born in Cuneo, Italy. Giordano died on 2 December 2021 from problems caused by COVID-19 at a hospital in Louvain, Belgium at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgium Category:Italian Roman Catholic priests
title: Aldo Giordano
